pageTitle: Patagonia Girls' Better Sweater® Fleece Coat | Birch White
textBeforeTable: Boys' and Girls' Sizing Information Fit Guide Size Chart Reviews We promote fair labor practices, safe working conditions and environmental responsibility throughout the Patagonia supply chain. Below are the suppliers that impact the Patagonia Girls' Better Sweater® Fleece Coat View our supply chain The Footprint Chronicles® Made in Sri Lanka. 552 g (19.5 oz) 9.5-oz 100% polyester with a sweater-knit face and fleece interior Hand-me-down ID label Mid-thigh length On-seam handwarmer pockets Shirring detail on side waist and back seams Four button center-front closure Stand-up collar to tuck
